metadata.title: CVE-2020-17353 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
scm/define-stencil-commands.scm in LilyPond through 2.20.0, and 2.21.x through 2.21.4, when -dsafe is used, lacks restrictions on embedded-ps and embedded-svg, as demonstrated by including dangerous PostScript code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-17353` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lilypond - 2.20.0-2
lilypond-data - 2.20.0-2
lilypond-fonts - 2.20.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lilypond package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.20.0-2').
